title: Data Service Schema
description: A JSON schema for a data service file in the data catalog.

schema:image.title: Image URL
schema:image.description: URL for an image to be displayed in the data catalog. Choose an image that is related to the datasets content.

dct:identifier.title: Service id
dct:identifier.description: Identifier for this DataService. If left empty, it will be automatically assigned.

dct:title.title: DataService title
dct:title.description: Title for the DataService in multiple languages.

dct:description.title: DataService description
dct:description.description: Description for the series in multiple languages.

dct:publisher.title: Publisher
dct:publisher.description: Publisher or organization responsible for the DataService.

dcat:contactPoint.title: Contact point
dcat:contactPoint.description: Contact information for potential inquiries about the DataService.

dct:accessRights.title: Access rights
dct:accessRights.description: Defines the accessibility of the dataset (e.g., public, internal, etc.). See https://www.dcat-ap.ch/releases/3.0_workingdraft/dcat-ap-ch_3.0_workingdraft.html#bib-vocab-eu-access-right .

dcat:endopointURL.title: Endpoint URL
dcat:endopointURL.description: URL of the technical endpoint of the DataService.

dcat:landingPage.title: Landing page
dcat:landingPage.description: Landing page or homepage for the API.

dcat:servesDataset.title: Serves dataset
dcat:servesDataset.description: IDs of the datasets served by this DataService

dcat:endpointDescription.title: Endpoint description
dcat:endpointDescription.description: URL of technical documentation of the DataService, such as for example a Swagger documentation.

foaf:page.title: Related resources
foaf:page.description: Any related page, document or resource.

alias.title: Page alias
alias.description: Alias to be showed in the interface for this link.

uri.title: url
uri.description: URL for the page, document or resource

adms:versionNotes.title: Version notes
adms:versionNotes.description: A description of the differences between this version and a previous version of the Dataset.

dct:conformsTo.title: Conforms to
dct:conformsTo.description: Reference to a standard or specification the Service conforms to.

dcatap:applicableLegislation.title: Applicable legislation
dcatap:applicableLegislation.description: The legislation that mandates or allows the creation or management of the dataService.

bv:i14y.title: I14Y publication
bv:i14y.description: Indicates if the DataService metadata must be made available via the interoperability platform I14Y. Optionally references the I14Y publication ID.

bv:mustBePublished.title: I14Y publication flag
bv:mustBePublished.description: Indicates if the DataService must be published on I14Y. May be used by harvesters or automatic metadata publication. This is true by default.

dct:identifier.title: I14Y id
dct:identifier.description: Identifier for the DataService on I14Y.

dcat:accessURL.title: I14Y URL
dcat:accessURL.description: URL for the DataService on I14Y
